permissions: Allowed for admins or users who can update the required_by entity.
side_effects: Updates the certification requirement; if required_by is a JobProductionPlan, a recap generation is triggered after save.
validation_notes: At least one of --period-start or --period-end must be provided. Dates must be YYYY-MM-DD. If both period_start and period_end are set, period_start must be <= period_end. certification_type_id must be unique per required_by_id. required_by must support certification_requirements, must be a class allowed by certification_type.can_be_requirement_of, and its broker must match the certification_type broker.
